net.sf.mmm.util.http

Class HttpRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.http.HttpMessage
      • net.sf.mmm.util.http.HttpRequest

  • public class HttpRequest
extends HttpMessage
    This class represents an HTTP request message.
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Detail

      • getMethod

        public String getMethod()
        This method gets the HTTP method to use.
        The typical methods are GET, HEAD, POST.
        Returns:
        the HTTP method.

      • setMethod

        public void setMethod(String httpMethod)
        This method sets the HTTP method to use.
        Parameters:
        httpMethod - the HTTP method to set.

      • getUri

        public String getUri()
        This method gets the requested URI (e.g. "/").
        Returns:
        the requested URI.

      • setUri

        public void setUri(String requestUri)
        This method sets the requested URI.
        Parameters:
        requestUri - the uri to set
        See Also:
        getUri()

      • writeFirstLine

        protected void writeFirstLine(StringBuffer buffer)
        This method writes the first line (request-line or status-line) of the HTTP message.
        Specified by:
        writeFirstLine in class HttpMessage
        Parameters:
        buffer - is the string-buffer where to append the first line.
